name: hauk
description: Hauk is a self-hosted real-time location sharing app. It lets users share live location via temporary links without third-party tracking, suitable for safety or coordination during travel.
features: Real-Time Sharing: Share your live location with friends or family through temporary, secure links.
Temporary Links: Generate time-limited sharing links that automatically expire after a set duration.
Privacy-Focused: No third-party tracking or data collection, all location data stays on your server.
Android App: Native mobile app for easy location sharing from your smartphone.
Map Display: View shared locations on interactive maps with real-time position updates.
Group Sharing: Share location with multiple people simultaneously for coordinated activities.
Safety Feature: Ideal for travel safety, letting trusted contacts know your whereabouts.
Self-Hosted Control: Complete ownership of location data without relying on commercial services.
